messages.body:
roeselkunie2009@yahoo.com.hk





Dear Friend   
 
 I must inform you that your presence will be needed at the bank in Europe for the signing of the vital documents, of the safe depsoit box to enable the funds to be transfer to your personal account in your country.
  
 Please promise me that this transaction will be very confidential during the time of transferring these funds from the bank in Europe.
  
 I am urging you to send me the following informations immediately to enable you to have in contact with the bank and book a date with them as when you are to come over for the signing of the release order of the funds.  
  
 Info Required
  
 1 Full names and age.
  
 2 Contact address, phone and fax numbers
  
 3 Occupations 
  
 4  copy of your identity
  
 with these I will be able to forward you the contact details of the bank to enable you reach the bank and have an appointment with them.
  
 I hope you are well informed,
  
 God bless you.
  
 I look forward to hearing from you again. 
  
 Kind Regards 
Roesel Kunie
messages.raw:
Roesel Kunie

roeselkunie2009@yahoo.com.hk

[Although this reads like a continuation of a correspondence, it arrives out of the blue.]
Date: Sun, 28 Sep 2008

Dear Friend

I must inform you that your presence will be needed at the bank in Europe for the signing of the vital documents, of the safe depsoit box to enable the funds to be transfer to your personal account in your country.

Please promise me that this transaction will be very confidential during the time of transferring these funds from the bank in Europe.

I am urging you to send me the following informations immediately to enable you to have in contact with the bank and book a date with them as when you are to come over for the signing of the release order of the funds.

Info Required
1 Full names and age.
2 Contact address, phone and fax numbers
3 Occupations
4 copy of your identity

with these I will be able to forward you the contact details of the bank to enable you reach the bank and have an appointment with them.

I hope you are well informed,

God bless you.

I look forward to hearing from you again.

Kind Regards
Roesel Kunie

messages.body:
Dear Ms Kunie,
 
I am based in London so there is no problem in my going to Europe for any reason.
 
My age is 29 and I am secretary of the Holy Bagel Community. I cannot send any copies of my driving licence or passport over the internet because of the shocking number of fraudsters many of which I am ashamed to say are based in West Africa.
 
I myself come from Smegaroon, a small independent former British colony in the Indian Ocean.
 
Remain blessed,



TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
http://www.freewebs.com/tushiem/

messages.body:
Dear Tushie mashuganah
 
Thanks for your mail.
 
I understand you clearly but remember I am choosing you after I have being praying for the pass one month before I get in contact with you. So I have all the trust in you to carry out my wish in good faith.
 
Therefore  nothing to worry about as far you follow all instructions from me to meet the funds transfer In your favor so I want to ask you if you are willing to help in this matter and if you are willing to help you are to send me the require details for us to proceed immediately.
 
I hope you understood.
 
Yours truly,
Roesel

messages.body:
Sept. 30
 
 Dear Roesel,
 
Thank you for your letter but I have already given you all my personal details. Let me repeat that there is no way I can send you any documents to prove my identity because there are too many dishonest people  who might steal them.
 
However, as you say, your prayers have been answered. I am also a God-fearing lady. The Holy Bagel Community is a subsidiary of the Worldwide Brotherhood of Bintel Briv led by Bishop Shtarke O' Sullivan and the Reverend Cy Gezunt. Again, let me repeat that the Holy Bagel Community has funds of £3,000,000 sterling at its disposal but we are always in need of donations to ensure we are able to carry on our charitable work amongst schnorrers and ganefs everywhere.
 
So your prayers have been answered. Just send me further details.
 
Incidentally, what Church do you belong to ?
 
Remain blessed,


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community
P.O. Box 69
London GIT FU2
England
http://www.freewebs.com/tushiem/

Good to hear from you. 
 
Below are the contact details you are to contact them immediately and book a date with them to have the funds cleared in your favour as soon as you contact them follow all instructions from them for you to have the funds transfer to any account of your choice to meet my dreams in good faith.
  
CONTACT DETAILS 
 
Dr. Don Kepping (Vice President, Investment Services) 
Leed Securities Investment  
Strawinskylaan 337, 1077 XX Amsterdam, The Netherlands  
Email: invest@leedinvestments..com 
Tel: 0031.647.271.609 
Fax: 0031.847.291.980
 
Once again I thank you very much for your effort so far make sure you have in contact and book a date for this week.  
 
I am very sick now so do act fast and keep me informed.  
 
Yours truly, 
Roesel

messages.body:
invest@leedinvestments.com





 
 Attn: Tushie Meshuganah
 
 Dear Sir,
 
 In pursuant to our telephone discussion and your email of yesterday, we
 write to inform you that we received a letter of intent from Mrs. Roesel
 Kunie to commence clearing procedure of a deposit in our custody in your
 favour.
 
 We are satisfied with the authenticity of the letter of intent and other
 accompanying documents submitted. We will commence the appraisal and
 clearing processes of the deposit on receipt of the following;
 
 1. An acceptance letter on your availability in our office for this
 transaction
 2. Completion of the Deposit Appraisal Form (see attachment)
 
 In furtherance to the above, you will be required to make physical
 appearance in our office in Amsterdam-The Netherlands, for physical
 identification and signing of the receivership documents in your favour.
 The submission of the acceptance letter and completed appraisal form will
 serve as preliminary stage of commencing clearing processes* with the De
 Nederlandsche Bank (DNB) and Dutch Tax and Custom.
 
 Take note that we will handle the transfer of the deposit in your favour
 in a legal, professional and honest manner. For further clarifications
 contact the undersigned directly on phone number +31.647.271.609 and fax
 number +31.847.291.980.
 
 Thank you for availing us the opportunity to serve you.
 
 Yours faithfully,
 For: Leed Securities Investment
 
 Dr. Don Kepping
 Vice President (Investment Services)
 Direct Phone: +31.647.271.609
 
*

In furtherance to the above, you will be required to make physical appearance in our office in Amsterdam-The Netherlands, for physical identification and signing of the receivership documents in your favour. The submission of the acceptance letter and completed appraisal form will serve as preliminary stage of commencing clearing processes* with the De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB) and Dutch Tax and Custom.

Take note that we will handle the transfer of the deposit in your favour in a legal, professional and honest manner. For further clarifications contact the undersigned directly on phone number +31.647.271.609 and fax number +31.847.291.980.

Dr. Don Kepping

messages.body:
Oct. 5

Dear Kepping Don,
 
You have written to me before as Dr Don Kepping. Has your secretary misspelled your name ?
 
I am writing this note from my home in Smegaroon as tomorrow we begin four days of celebration to mark our independence from Britain in 1958. As this year marks the fiftieth anniversary of this happy event I have taken leave from my work in London and will not return until Monday October 13th.
 
So I suggest that to complete modalities as quickly as possible you fill out the necessary form on my behalf. I have sent you all relevant details and you may take this note as my acceptance of my availability to come tyo your office - after October 13th, of course.
 
Meanwhile may I send you our best wishes in Smegaronian - gai kuck'n oif de yam.
 
Remain blessed,


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.body:
Oct. 16

Dear Mr Kepping,
 
Ms Meshuganah is out of the office until tomorrow morning but she has asked me to reply to your e-mail.
 
She looks forward to hearing from you. However, she will need to know about the sundry charges mentioned in your note. Would you please inform her what these relate to - and also whether they will exceed £500 or $1,000 US dollars. If these charges are above these limits she will have to obtain clearance from one of the Holy Bagel Community directors. However, Ms Meshuganah is authorised to make payments on her own authority for any amount under £500 or $1,000.
 
Yours sincerely,

Gay Indread
Secretary to
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
invest@leedinvestments.com




 Attn: Tushie Meshuganah
 Dear Madam,
 
 I am glad to inform you on the the successful completion of the appraisal
 exercise today in respect of funds depose in your favour by Mrs. Roesel
 Kunie. We are writing to invite you to the endorsement ceremony and the
 receivership of funds amounting to US$24,000,000.00 (Twenty Four Million
 US Dollars only) whose receivership will be completed on your arrival and
 completion of the
 endorsement formalities in our office.
 
 In furtherance to your availability for the endorsement/signing ceremony
 in our office, be informed that all arrangements have been perfected to
 the successful conclusion of the transaction in your favour. You are
 required to bring with you the following to the endorsement ceremony;
 
 1. Proof of personal identification (driver's license or international
 passport).
 2. Four (4) passport photograph not exceeding six (6) months.
 3. The sum of €9,600:00 (Nine Thousand, Six Hundred Euros only) in cash,
 representing due process charges from the results of the appraisal and due
 diligence exercise.
 
 This amount is payable in our office before the endorsement exercise. An
 official appointment for the endorsement ceremony has been scheduled for
 Wednesday October 22nd, 2008. Please confirm your availability by sending
 us your travel itenarary and hotel reservation.
 
 For further clarifications contact the undersigned directly on phone
 number +31.647.249.180.
 
 Thank you for availing us the opportunity to serve you.

In furtherance to your availability for the endorsement/signing ceremony in our office, be informed that all arrangements have been perfected to the successful conclusion of the transaction in your favour. You are required to bring with you the following to the endorsement ceremony;

2. Four (4) passport photograph not exceeding six (6) months.

This amount is payable in our office before the endorsement exercise. An official appointment for the endorsement ceremony has been scheduled for Wednesday October 22nd, 2008. Please confirm your availability by sending us your travel itenarary and hotel reservation.

messages.body:
Oct. 17

Dear Don,
 
I am now back in the office and I must say that I am shocked by your e-mail. The amount of money you require - nine thousand six hundred euros - is far more than I expected. As my assistant, Ms Gay Indread, informed you, I am only able to authorise payments of up to £500  without referral to our Finance Controller, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq. 
 
To speed up matters, may I suggest that you simply deduct 9,600 euros from the twenty four million US dollars once we complete the transaction. In the meantime please inform me when and where the endorsement/signing ceremony will take place.
 
Remain blessed,


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
The Holy Bagel Community

As my assistant, Ms Gay Indread, informed you, I am only able to authorise payments of up to £500 [or 750 Euros] without referral to our Finance Controller, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq.

To speed up matters, may I suggest that you simply deduct 9,600 euros from the twenty four million US dollars once we complete the transaction. In the meantime please inform me when and where the endorsement/signing ceremony will take place.

messages.body:
invest@leedinvestments.com




 Dear Tushie,
 
 Your last email request refers.
 
 Firstly, the endorsement ceremony will be taking place in our office in
 Amsterdam an official appointment for the endorsement ceremony has been
 scheduled for Wednesday October 22nd, 2008.
 
 Secondly, the requirements which you are expected to fulfill in the
 endorsement ceremony before the transfer of receivership of funds in your
 favour is in accordance with the government's stipulated financial
 provisions.
 
 Our apex bank, that regulates all financial transaction is De Nedelandsche
 Bank (DNB). When large funds are received by any bank or financial
 institutions, a report of the deposit must be made to the DNB. The DNB
 Inspectors will come and make full inventory of the amount received and
 that amount is recorded. They will also periodically carry out quarterly
 inventory on deposits apart from us sending to them monthly inventory of
 our deposit. Before any transaction will take place, the DNB must be
 notified and clearance obtain from their office before the transfer of
 receivership is perfected.
 
 This brings me to your transaction. When the aforestated funds in your
 transaction was received, we complied with the Financial Acts provision in
 reporting the deposit to the DNB and now that the funds are to be received
 by you, we are expected to process clearances from the DNB and Dutch Tax
 and Customs before the transaction will commence. This amount of €9,600.00
 which represents the due diligence and clearing chargess will go into
 legitimizing the transfer of receiveship of the funds in your name. This
 amount cannot be deucted from the deposited funds becuase it is illegal to
 do so. Since the DNB officials are aware of the recorded figure of the
 deposited amount, it will be illegal if we take out the €9,600.00 from the
 deposit. If it is not possible to deduct the amount, the onus falls on you
 to fully comply with the payment in our office to enable us secure the
 necessary clearance with the DNB and Dutch tax and Customs.
 
 We are professionals here and follow the rule of law. This transaction is
 being handled in a legal and honest manner with recourse to peace of mind
 as we dont want a future situation where either you or Leed Group will be
 subjected to legal and ethical encumberance in the handling of this
 transaction.
 
 You have to convey the acceptance of our requirements to allow us continue
 the logistic already commenced that will facilitate the transaction. We
 shall be grateful for your urgent response, as it will serve as
 preliminary step to your attending the endorsement ceremony.
 
 Regards,
 For: Leed Securities Investment
 
 Dr. Don Kepping
messages.raw:
Dr. Don Kepping

invest@leedinvestments.com

Date: Fri, 17 Oct 2008

Dear Tushie,

Your last email request refers.

Firstly, the endorsement ceremony will be taking place in our office in Amsterdam an official appointment for the endorsement ceremony has been scheduled for Wednesday October 22nd, 2008.

Secondly, the requirements which you are expected to fulfill in the endorsement ceremony before the transfer of receivership of funds in your favour is in accordance with the government's stipulated financial provisions.

Our apex bank, that regulates all financial transaction is De Nedelandsche Bank (DNB). When large funds are received by any bank or financial institutions, a report of the deposit must be made to the DNB. The DNB Inspectors will come and make full inventory of the amount received and that amount is recorded. They will also periodically carry out quarterly inventory on deposits apart from us sending to them monthly inventory of our deposit. Before any transaction will take place, the DNB must be notified and clearance obtain from their office before the transfer of receivership is perfected.

This brings me to your transaction. When the aforestated funds in your transaction was received, we complied with the Financial Acts provision in reporting the deposit to the DNB and now that the funds are to be received by you, we are expected to process clearances from the DNB and Dutch Tax and Customs before the transaction will commence. This amount of €9,600.00 which represents the due diligence and clearing chargess will go into legitimizing the transfer of receiveship of the funds in your name. This amount cannot be deucted from the deposited funds becuase it is illegal to do so. Since the DNB officials are aware of the recorded figure of the deposited amount, it will be illegal if we take out the €9,600.00 from the deposit. If it is not possible to deduct the amount, the onus falls on you to fully comply with the payment in our office to enable us secure the necessary clearance with the DNB and Dutch tax and Customs.

We are professionals here and follow the rule of law. This transaction is being handled in a legal and honest manner with recourse to peace of mind as we dont want a future situation where either you or Leed Group will be subjected to legal and ethical encumberance in the handling of this transaction.

You have to convey the acceptance of our requirements to allow us continue the logistic already commenced that will facilitate the transaction. We shall be grateful for your urgent response, as it will serve as preliminary step to your attending the endorsement ceremony.

Regards,
For: Leed Securities Investment

Dr. Don Kepping

messages.body:
Oct. 17

Dear Dr Don,
 
Thank you for your quick response.
 
I understand that it would be illegal to take the cash from the 24 million dollars so I propose one of these two alternatives to continue these modalities.
 
1. If your organisation - Leed Investments - puts up the 9,600 Euros I can send you 750 Euros as a deposit which would be forfeited if this business is not concluded to our mutual satisfaction. I cannot see how you would lose under this plan because if I do not pay you back the 9,600 euros immediately after receiving my money, you can simply stop the 24 million US dollars cheque.
 
2. But if for some reason you cannot agree to this arrangement, I will have to obtain authorisation from my superior, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq to send you 9,600 euros. I must add that this might be difficult to obtain before Wednesday October 22. 
 
Meanwhile, I would suggest that the ceremony takes place between midday and 2pm as this will allow me to catch an early flight from London and to return the same day so I will not need to make any hotel reservation.
 
Sincerely, 


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah
Oct. 17

I cannot see how you would lose under this plan because if I do not pay you back the 9,600 euros immediately after receiving my money, you can simply stop the 24 million US dollars cheque.

2. But if for some reason you cannot agree to this arrangement, I will have to obtain authorisation from my superior, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq to send you 9,600 euros. I must add that this might be difficult to obtain before Wednesday October 22.

Meanwhile, I would suggest that the ceremony takes place between midday and 2pm as this will allow me to catch an early flight from London and to return the same day so I will not need to make any hotel reservation.

Sincerely,

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.subject: RE: Invitation to Endorsement Exercise
messages.body:
invest@leedinvestments.com




 
 Dear Tushie,
 
 In answer to your proposal, you do not presently qualify for the extension
 of the credit facility €9,600.00 by Leed Group because you have not met
 the minimum requirements to enjoy such status.
 
 Furthermore, not qualifing does not mean total denial of further
 cooperation in accessing needed fundings for you. The only window of
 opportunity opened, is the elevation or changing your present status to
 that of a permanent beneficiary in the intended reprofiled funds. The
 basic requirement is the payment of €2,500.00 (Two Thousand, Five Hundred
 euros only) towards the enforceability of change of status of the deposit
 to your name as beneficiary. If we can receive the amount of €2,500.00
 before the close of work on Saturday, you will be able to enjoy this rare
 priviledge. Why Saturday is because it takes another 48hrs to conclude the
 permanent status to your name.
 
 If you can send the amount via Moneygram, we can achieve the loan facility
 in you favour for next week.
 
 If the above is acceptable by you, kindly use the receiver's name below to
 send the €2,500.00 via western union money transfer.
 
 First name: Tom
 Last name: Wesley
 City: Amsterdam
 Country: The Netherlands
 Amount: €2,500.00
 
 Immediately money has been sent, kindly email me the following information
 as contained in the moneygram payment receipt that contains the refernce
 number;
 
 Sender's First Name:
 Sender's Last Name:
 City:
 Country:
 Reference Number:
 Amount:
 
 If the above is not acceptable by you, we have no other option than to
 wait for you to obtain authorisation from your superior, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq
 to send €9,600.00 needed to conclude the whole process. I accede to your
 request and the ceremony can be achieved between 1200Hrs to 1400Hrs to
 enable you return the same day.
 
 Sincerely,
 
 Don
messages.raw:
Dr. Don Kepping

invest@leedinvestments.com

Date: Fri, 17 Oct 2008
Subject: RE: Invitation to Endorsement Exercise

Dear Tushie,

In answer to your proposal, you do not presently qualify for the extension of the credit facility €9,600.00 by Leed Group because you have not met the minimum requirements to enjoy such status.

Furthermore, not qualifing does not mean total denial of further cooperation in accessing needed fundings for you. The only window of opportunity opened, is the elevation or changing your present status to that of a permanent beneficiary in the intended reprofiled funds. The basic requirement is the payment of €2,500.00 (Two Thousand, Five Hundred euros only) towards the enforceability of change of status of the deposit to your name as beneficiary. If we can receive the amount of €2,500.00 before the close of work on Saturday, you will be able to enjoy this rare priviledge. Why Saturday is because it takes another 48hrs to conclude the permanent status to your name.

If you can send the amount via Moneygram, we can achieve the loan facility in you favour for next week.

If the above is acceptable by you, kindly use the receiver's name below to send the €2,500.00 via western union money transfer.

First name: Tom
Last name: Wesley
City: Amsterdam
Country: The Netherlands
Amount: €2,500.00

Immediately money has been sent, kindly email me the following information as contained in the moneygram payment receipt that contains the refernce number;

Sender's First Name:
Sender's Last Name:
City:
Country:
Reference Number:
Amount:

If the above is not acceptable by you, we have no other option than to wait for you to obtain authorisation from your superior, El Haj Yuliq Mdiq to send €9,600.00 needed to conclude the whole process. I accede to your request and the ceremony can be achieved between 1200Hrs to 1400Hrs to enable you return the same day.

Sincerely,

Don

messages.body:
Oct. 20


Dear Don,
 
Thank you for your prompt reply.
 
Unfortunately, as I have already informed you, I can only authorise payments up to approximately 1,000 Euros. So whilst I appreciate your efforts to bring down the amount needed to claim the funds from 9,600 euros to 2,500 Eutros, I regret that this is still too high a figure for me to issue a cheque which bears only my signature.
 
Nevertheless, I have spoken to my director, El Haj Uliq Mdiq and he has shown considerable interest in this business and at his request I have passed our correspondence to his office. He is attending a meeting of the European division of the Council of United Nations Trustees in London this morning but he has asked me to say that he will respond to you either later today or first thing tomorrow morning.
 
Remain blessed,

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah
Oct. 20

Thank you for your prompt reply.

Nevertheless, I have spoken to my director, El Haj Uliq Mdiq and he has shown considerable interest in this business and at his request I have passed our correspondence to his office. He is attending a meeting of the European division of the Council of United Nations Trustees in London this morning but he has asked me to say that he will respond to you either later today or first thing tomorrow morning.

Remain blessed,
TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

messages.body:
Dear Mr Kopping,
 
Ms Tushie has passed your correspondence with her to me. 
 
Although I am minded to proceed with this exercise on the basis of a payment of two thousand five hundred euros, I would prefer to pay these fees in cash directly to your company in Amsterdam. I will of course require a receipt and full documention for this money.
 
I shall be be in The Netherlands early next week and could meet you in Amsterdam next Monday October 27th. Would 12 noon at the reception desk of the Grand Hotel Krasnopolsky Dam 9 be convenient ?
 
Yours sincerely,
 
El Haj Yuliq Mdiq 
Associate Director 
The Holy Bagel Community
messages.raw:
El Haj Yuliq Mdiq

[Tushie brings in the heavy cavalry]

Dear Mr Kopping,

Ms Tushie has passed your correspondence with her to me.

Although I am minded to proceed with this exercise on the basis of a payment of two thousand five hundred euros, I would prefer to pay these fees in cash directly to your company in Amsterdam. I will of course require a receipt and full documention for this money.

I shall be be in The Netherlands early next week and could meet you in Amsterdam next Monday October 27th. Would 12 noon at the reception desk of the Grand Hotel Krasnopolsky Dam 9 be convenient ?

Yours sincerely,

El Haj Yuliq Mdiq
Associate Director [Finance]
The Holy Bagel Community

messages.body:
Attn: Mr. El Haj Uliq Mdiq
 Ms. Tushie
 
 This message is in furtherance to your email. It is a pity that I inform
 you that the cut-off date for the payment of the 2,500 Euros was on or
 before Saturday October 18. Since you were unable to meet our cut-off
 date, the window of opportunity I could have helped in bridging the
 balance is no longer available.
 
 The only option we will accept is full acceptance and liability of the
 total due procees fees of 9,600 Euros. If you are desirous for the meeting
 and completion of the endorsement exercise, we can achieve it on Monday
 October 27. We can have a meeting between 1200 noon to 1400pm. I will be
 sending a car to pick you from the Grand Hotel Krasnopolsky Dam 9 on
 Monday at 12 noon. Kindly convey your acceptance.
 
 Sincere regards.
 
 Don
messages.raw:
Dr. Don Kepping
Date: Mon, 20 Oct 2008

Attn: Mr. El Haj Uliq Mdiq
Ms. Tushie

This message is in furtherance to your email. It is a pity that I inform you that the cut-off date for the payment of the 2,500 Euros was on or before Saturday October 18. Since you were unable to meet our cut-off date, the window of opportunity I could have helped in bridging the balance is no longer available.

The only option we will accept is full acceptance and liability of the total due procees fees of 9,600 Euros. If you are desirous for the meeting and completion of the endorsement exercise, we can achieve it on Monday October 27. We can have a meeting between 1200 noon to 1400pm. I will be sending a car to pick you from the Grand Hotel Krasnopolsky Dam 9 on Monday at 12 noon. Kindly convey your acceptance.

Sincere regards.

Don

messages.body:
Oct. 21

Dear Dr Kopping,
 
Thank you for your prompt reply. I look forward to meeting you next Monday in Amsterdam. I shall be standing at the reception desk of the Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky. Your driver will recognise me as I wear glasses, I have a short grey beard and I shall be wearing a dark blue suit.
 
Two further questions:
 
1. I presume our business won't take too much time - I need to be back at the hotel by 2.30pm at the latest.
 
2. The Holy Bagel Community uses pounds sterling, US dollars and Smegaroon golden dorks for its banking purposes. It would be convenient for me to pay the fees in one of these currencies - i.e. £7,740/$12,7600/SD3419 - rather than in Euroes. Which currency do you prefer ?
 
Yours sincerely,
 
El Haj YuliqMdiq
Associate Director 
The Holy Bagel Community

El Haj Yuliq Mdiq
Oct. 21

messages.body:
Dear Mr. El Haj Uliq Mdiq & Ms. Tushie,
 
 Thank you for your message.
 
 I have checked my schedule for Monday and I think its convinient for me to
 meet you personally at Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky. It is noted you wear
 glasses, with a short grey beard and with a dark blue suit. I will also be
 wearing a blue suit and will be free to see you by 1200 Noon on Monday.
 
 In answer to your request, the meeting will not be long and the amount
 preferable is the Pounds Sterling (£7,740.00). Please advice a mobile
 number I might reach and you can call me directly on +31.647.249.180.
 
 Look forward to meeting with you and conclusion completion of our
 business.
 
 Remain Blessed.
 
 Don Kepping

In answer to your request, the meeting will not be long and the amount preferable is the Pounds Sterling (£7,740.00). Please advice a mobile number I might reach and you can call me directly on +31.647.249.180.

messages.body:
Dear Dr Kopping,
 
Unfortunately El Haj Yuliq Mdiq has been called to a meeting in Smegaroon this weekend and will be unable to see you on Monday.
 
However, I shall be leaving Smegaroon tomorrow evening and so I will be able to take his place. Therefore I look forward to seeing you at 12 noon at the reception desk of the Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky.
 
I attach a recent photograph of myself .
 
Perhaps you would be kind enough to acknowledge receipt of this e-mail.
 
Yours sincerely,

Joseph Gross-Kucker
Deputy Finance Manager
The Holy Bagel Community
c/o. Box 666
Smegaroon City
messages.raw:
Joseph Kucker

[The Holy Bagel Community's financial staff are mustered]

Date: October 24, 2008

Dear Dr Kopping,

Unfortunately El Haj Yuliq Mdiq has been called to a meeting in Smegaroon this weekend and will be unable to see you on Monday.

However, I shall be leaving Smegaroon tomorrow evening and so I will be able to take his place. Therefore I look forward to seeing you at 12 noon at the reception desk of the Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky.

I attach a recent photograph of myself [taken after our annual charity football match against the Salvation Army].

Perhaps you would be kind enough to acknowledge receipt of this e-mail.

Yours sincerely,

Joseph Gross-Kucker
Deputy Finance Manager
The Holy Bagel Community
c/o. Box 666
Smegaroon City

[Mr. Gross-Kucker's photo looks like a scammer pic, which may itself have been lifted from someone's passport. Or a jail photograph.]

messages.body:
Dear El Haj Yuliq Mdiq,
 
 I understand you will be away and wont be able to be at our meeting. I
 will also be indispose because I will be Hong Kong for urgent business
 matters.
 
 We will communicate a suitable date for our meeting.
 
 Sincerely,
 
 Don
messages.raw:
Dr. Don Kepping
Date: Sat, 25 Oct 2008

Dear El Haj Yuliq Mdiq,

I understand you will be away and wont be able to be at our meeting. I will also be indispose because I will be Hong Kong for urgent business matters.

We will communicate a suitable date for our meeting.

Sincerely,

Don

messages.body:
Oct. 26

Dear Don,
 
I hope this reaches you before you leave for Hong Kong.
 
There is an old proverb in Smegaroon which says: 'if you want something done, go to the people who are busy'!
 
As you see I am here in the office on Sunday trying to catch up on my correspondence whilst my bosses El Haj Yuliq Mdiq and Joseph Gross-Kucker are having a nice time in the Smegaroon sunshine at their Conference of Underdeveopled Nations Trusteeship conference.
 
Anyhow, to business - whilst they are away I have spoken to our spiritual advisor Bishop Ronald Ngoblah and he has given me authority to conclude our transaction. It will not be necessary for me to meet you in Amsterdam  - just send me your bank details and we can make an electronic transfer of funds.
 
Remain blessed,


TUSHIE MESHUGANAH
messages.raw:
Tushie Meshuganah
Oct. 26

Dear Don,

I hope this reaches you before you leave for Hong Kong.

There is an old proverb in Smegaroon which says: 'if you want something done, go to the people who are busy'!

As you see I am here in the office on Sunday trying to catch up on my correspondence whilst my bosses El Haj Yuliq Mdiq and Joseph Gross-Kucker are having a nice time in the Smegaroon sunshine at their Conference of Underdeveopled Nations Trusteeship conference.

Anyhow, to business - whilst they are away I have spoken to our spiritual advisor Bishop Ronald Ngoblah and he has given me authority to conclude our transaction. It will not be necessary for me to meet you in Amsterdam [unless you insist on this] - just send me your bank details and we can make an electronic transfer of funds.

Remain blessed,

TUSHIE MESHUGANAH

Oct. 31
 
 
 Dear Don,
 
Are you back from Hong Kong ? I await a reply to my e-mail of October 26th.

Are you back from Hong Kong ? I await a reply to my e-mail of October 26th.
